header.title: ct_testspec

erlref.modulesummary: Parsing of test specifications for Common Test.

description.p: Parsing of test specifications for Common Test.
This module exports help functions for parsing of test specifications.

func.name: get_tests(SpecsIn) -> {ok, [{Specs,Tests}]} | {error, Reason}
func.fsummary: Parse the given test specification files and return the tests to run and skip.

desc.p: Parse the given test specification files and return the tests to run and skip.
If SpecsIn=[Spec1,Spec2,...], separate tests will be created per specification. If SpecsIn=[[Spec1,Spec2,...]], all specifications will be merge into one test.
For each test, a {Specs,Tests} element is returned, where Specs is a list of all included test specifications, and Tests specifies actual tests to run/skip per node.
